ygData.subject: Better, Stronger Faster

Lunarpine sat with Veratis, both seemed like old friends by now. 
Lunarpine had answered most of Veratis' questions satisfactory, now 
it was time for the truth. 

"Why did you change me?" Lunarpine wanted the truth and nothing else.

"I needed someone to help me. Someone adapted to this world." It was 
the same answer Lunarpine had gotten since the first time he'd asked 
the question. 

"That's not good enough anymore, Why did you change me?" Lunarpine 
was beginning to become furious with the scientist.

There was a pause in the room, the tension could've been cut with a 
knife. "Because you could be more. I saw you as the perfect 
beneficiary of my treatment. You're a better Translife form now. The 
science bot seemed out of his mind but that didn't stop Lunarpine 
from asking the next question

"How am I better? I'm still a wolfbot." He'd thought about it for a 
while, he did feal different somehow. (In case you're wondering yes 
his eyes are healed in his new body.)

"Step outside and I'll demonstrate." Veratis had Lunarpines full 
attention now so he followed him out. 

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, logomorph@h... wrote:
> ::Shadow Wing::
> 
> She felt cold.  She tried as hard as she cold to try to connect to 
> Lunarpine, but couldn't find a connection.  She felt alone and 
> helpless.  She couldn't defend herself without a body, but she 
didn't 
> want to give up.  She tried again to connect with Lunarpine, but 
> still couldn't find a connection.  She felt her spark fall and she 
> had no choice but to give up and wait.
